name: Pending Rejection Out To Customer
query:
SELECT
A.name as "Rejection In ID :Link/Stock Entry:150",
A.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
B.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
B.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
B.qty as "Rejection In Quantity:Float:100",
B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity as "Rejection Out Quantity:Int:100",
B.qty - B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity as "Pending Quantity:150"
from `tabStock Entry` A  JOIN`tabStock Entry Detail` B ON A.name = B.parent AND branch = %(branch)s AND  A.type_of_stock_entry
IN("Rejection In") AND B.qty-B.reference_rej_in_or_rej_quantity > 0 AND  A.posting_date = CURDATE()

;
